content.detailedDescription:
I was driving back from a work trip about 4 years ago (about 5 hour drive .. do it regularly). i honestly can not pinpoint the year or month only that it was about 4 years ago and it was late at night.  an odd light caught my eye in the distance over a road about 5 miles away as a bird flys that i later needed to travel.  i turned down the road and the light was more distant but still to the east. it never looked like a plane in the way it moved and it was odd enough that i kept watching for it.   it was almost if it shifted around rather than fly at normal speeds.

then it was no longer in the distant east, it was directly ahead of me due south.  i slowed down at the t intersection and looked up at it.  it was stopped directly over me / slightly ahead of me but only 100 feet off the ground....It was not moving / stopped still and it was not a commercial plane/jet.

it did have a lot of bright lights on it.  it may have been round or angular it all happened very fast and i did not really stare at it except to see the bright lights had stopped above me. self preservation instincts took over and i rounded the corner and stepped on gas to get away from it.  i thought maybe it was some new military craft and i was afraid that they may use me as target practice.  it made no noise.  since then i have talked to ex military people and no one knows of any craft that can do that.  there are a few houses around the area.  

it is definitely unidentied flying object.  i was probably the #1 sceptic in the world but now i know first hand they exist. i know planes and jets and never before or since have ever seen anything like this anywhere. 
no planes fly to the airports in that direction ever.  they never would fly that low and they certainly would not stop above me and i have no explanation on how it was far east and then suddenly in front of me. it was not an illusion it literally stopped above my vehicle.

this is the first i ever reported it and i know it does not help you much except i know they exist.  for years i explained it to myself as an experimental military craft and part of me still believes this.  i dont know what it was and i do not want my name mentioned anywhere ever.

until this day i truly regret not stopping to see it better but at the same time i remember how frightening it was and i just wanted to get away from it.
content.summary: First saw light moving from distance then craft stopped above me at t intersection in country and i sped off.

content.detailedDescription:
My father was in the air force air police stationed at walker afb, nm (roswell) from 51-54.  my oldest sister and i were both born at walker. i don't know the exact date of the events but my father worked flight line security as an air policeman between 51-54.  

my mother related to me that when they were first assigned to walker that there had never been any mention or scuttlebutt about the "roswell" incident from the 40s.  one night he came home from work(they lived in base housing)and she said he was very frightened and white as a sheet.  he said that there had been an incident on the flight line and that afterwards he had been told that everything about it was classified and if he spoke about it he would be prosecuted. 

he told her that a disc shaped object had landed on the flight line and that they had surrounded it...At a distance...And it sat there for approximately 2 hours.  she said that all of security, dcm, base commander etc responded to the incident.  they photographed it non-stop. there was no interaction between anyone and the craft and after about 2 hours on the ground it simply lifted off and flew off as quickly as it had arrived.

later she said they had another incident with the same craft but this time there was some limited interaction between the it and one of the aps vehicles.  she said that this time as my dad told her it did not set down but hovered over the base for a period of time and for a little while seemed to follow one of the aps vehicles. 

my dad left the af after 54 and never talked about this to anyone that i'm aware of....He passed away about 15 years ago.  i overheard my mom talking to someone about this when i was younger but never discussed it with her until later in life.  a little over a year ago my mom passed away after battling cancer.  prior to her death we setup a video camera to record my mom as she talked about different things....On one of these days i asked her about the walker incident and she retold the account again basically as i had overheard it years ago.

as there were a lot of people that supposedly were aware of these incidents i've always been surprised that no one has ever come forward about it.
content.summary: Disk shaped object.

content.detailedDescription: It was just a day or two before thanksgiving i was driving from oklahoma city to elk city on highway 40 well at one point on the highway the oncoming lanes are split with trees on each side of the highway well i noticed a what appeared to be blue warning lights flashing about 5 feet outside of the trees at this point the lights are 200 to 300 yards in front there was also a man with his wife, driving a truck with a camper in the right lane, next to me as our vehicles got closer (about 25 yards) the blue lights turned orange, a then unusual shaped object (what i believe to be the ufo) came onto the highway i slammed on my brakes and so did the man driving the truck, he almost jack knifed his truck and camper the ufo then shot off at an angle into the sky leaving a small trail of light, it remained in the sky for a brief moment and then was gone. at this point i was at a complete stop in the highway, i looked at the man and his wife he shook his head at me and then sped off, i was confused more than anything, then after the general shock was gone i was just terrified (how i truly felt i don't think can be described in words)
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Blinking ufo on highway 40.

content.detailedDescription: I am not sure i can add much of value to the discription, but it seemed to be dark greyish brown.  mayby a matt finish, or something non glossy that had no observable reflections of light, as a smooth surface would. it seemed to be centered above or focused on the farmhouse.  i don't have a witness to the event, because i could not get my passenger to look in the correct direction to see the object untill it was too late and the object had fled quickly, or just dissapeared.  i looked away for an instant to talk to the passenger, and it was gone,  no trace.  it was the first time i seen a craft up close, relatively close.  i have seen lights in the sky before from a great distance, and they were distinguished from meteors by the fact that they turned corners instantaneously and were able to accelerate at a great rate of speed.  i am aware that these objects may have been unmanned military craft.  but the one i seen on cherry valley road was definately not any craft known to the public and did not fit any discription of any top secret craft like the stealth series.  i did not think it was any known object, and immediately recognized that it was unfamiliar and out of place.  when i saw the craft, i felt surprise, cautionary feelings, not necessarily fear as it was quite a ways away.  i also felt fascination and belief, as i did not give any credence to ufo sightings in the past, before i saw the far away lights, and the craft hanging over the farm.
content.summary: I was driving down cherry valley rd.  and i saw a large disc or cigar shaped object hanging motionless over a farm, just above the large oak trees.  it was as large as the whole yard, maybe an acre.  from approx. 1000 yds.

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking out my bedroom window nne and i saw this light come across the sky, thinking it was a meteor, but it stopped. from the bottom a smaller one dropped a little below the larger one. then stopped, where apone the larger one took off at a tremendous speed from which it came and the smaller one took off in the opposit direction.
i was in my bedroom and just looking at the sky
i couldn't beleve what i saw
i didn't tell anyone because i was just a kid and they think i was crazy.
this all happened in the fall of 1954 on a clear crisp night
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White light that looked like a meteor at first, however it stopped and a smaller object dropped from the bottom

content.detailedDescription:
Well my girl freind sent me a picture of her in the moring between 6am to 7am i dont really know what it is she was getting ready for work  

it looks like a small hand gray silver in color




before this picture she has been seeing things in her house at night and some sort of e.T. abduction symptoms 

please send me a email on your response
content.summary: E.T. picture.

content.detailedDescription:
On this particular night, i was parking my car after returning home from a friends house. i generally look up at the night sky anyways, but on this particular night i heard a helicopter approaching from my right of me, thinking nothing much of it i get out of the car and pan my head over in the direction of the helicopter. when i did this, i saw a very large object slowly approach over head and it looked to me like it was being escorted by a helicopter. the helicopter was flying directly adjacent to this very large triangular object, i'd say it was about 2-3 football fields in diameter. i saw the 3 bright lights making out the triangular shape, and noticed a very slow pulsing red light in the bottom of the object.

stunned at what i was seeing i froze to look at the object in the middle of the street. it was about 6-700 feet above me flying fairly low and extremely slow for an aircraft that large. the curious thing about it, was that it made absolutely no noise. all i heard the whole time was the sound of the helicopter and nothing else. when the object went straight over my head, i felt a very eerie feeling like i was being watched at that very moment. after it went over head and beyond the horizon, it looked like it was heading toward (the direction) of march air force base into the san timoteo canyon. the total event only lasted a few minutes, and i thought it was very interesting that it looked like the helicopter was escorting it.
content.summary: Triangular object, a light at each point, and a slowly pulsing red light in the middle.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and i were driving home from lodi around 6:45 pm, and, as usual, we were talking when i decided to look out and see if i could see any stars as the weather was finally clear.
just above us, but slightly to the south, i saw a flashing light.  very bright, very white, and flashing like a strobe light does.  it was, from where i was about the size of an m & m candy, and traveling rather too slowly to be a plane.  i would estimate it was probably about 30,000 ft. up.  it continued on a southward path while just a few degrees lower to the southwest a plane was going to the east with its standard red and green lights flashing.  my daughter said, that's just a plane., but from the drivers seat she could not see the strobe like thing.  since we were driving, of course i could not determine if there was any sound   i can't discount that this might be a plane, but certainly i have never seen a plane using those kind of lights.  it actually looked to be a ball of light rather than lights spaced along the length of something.
i watched it for approx 12 minutes until it vanished in the south.  because there was no near 'contact' i cannot describe any unusual effects, except that i spent a very restless night constantly seeing the thing in my mind and wondering what it could have been.  any ideas what this might be?
content.summary: Saw a flashinging, strobe like light crossing the sky

content.detailedDescription: While driving from my house heading west i notices what at first appeared to me to be a satellite in the night sky's. but when i saw it was moving up and down in a split second and its orange/red color i change my mind. after that i came to a stop sign and change my direction to the north and the object also accelerated to the north with great speed. by then i was driving in the middle of the road beacause i could not belief my eyes. then, i came to a street light and change my direction to the east and guess what? the object change direction to the east, by that time i was a little nervous. but still i was thinking theres another explenation for what i was seeing. all my windows were down, so there was no reflection of any lights. again i stop at a street light and focused my vision on a lightpoll to confirmed that  the object was moving and sure enough it was. it all most seem to me that it had the same heading and speed as my car. stoping and going like my car was. scary stuff!. finally, i change directions to the north and of course the object did the same, by that time it seemed to be all most on top of central tucson and finally it dissapered. it was like the object dimmed his light.
content.summary: While i was heading south on my car i noticed a strange orange/red circle on the sky. it was moving up and down in split seconds. then changing direction from west to east and finally north. the object was making complete stops in mid air.

content.detailedDescription: While driving from my house heading west i notices what at first appeared to me to be a satellite in the night sky's. but when i saw it was moving up and down in a split second and its orange/red color i change my mind. after that i came to a stop sign and change my direction to the north and the object also accelerated to the north with great speed. by then i was driving in the middle of the road beacause i could not belief my eyes. then, i came to a street light and change my direction to the east and guess what? the object change direction to the east, by that time i was a little nervous. but still i was thinking theres another explenation for what i was seeing. all my windows were down, so there was no reflection of any lights. again i stop at a street light and focused my vision on a lightpoll to confirmed that  the object was moving and sure enough it was. it all most seem to me that it had the same heading and speed as my car. stoping and going like my car was. scary stuff!. finally, i change directions to the north and of course the object did the same, by that time it seemed to be all most on top of central tucson and finally it dissapered. it was like the object dimmed his light.
content.summary: While i was heading south on my car i notices a strange orange/red circle on the sky. it was moving up and down in split seconds.  then changing direction from west to east and finally north. the object was making complete stops in mid air.

content.detailedDescription: On 03/04/2010 at approximately 20:15 i was stopped at a stop sign wolf nursery and the north west loop, when i looked south to make sure traffic was clear i noticed four orange lights to the southwest. i noticed the light were from east to west and started to disappear one at a time. i told my wife and she did not see anything at the time. i turned south and drove to water tower road to get away from all the city lights. on the way my wife saw several flashing light to the west of the water tower.  we stopped and saw multiple flashing lights that were moving from west to east. the object was moving to the east toward granbury and was followed by what i believed to be air planes that were very fast, i cannot say that the planes following were military or not, i do know that object left after the planes arrived.
content.summary: Four square orange light that dispeared one at a time

content.detailedDescription: All sightings seen at my house in the outskirts of town of tucson.Az. i started looking towards the west side of tucson mountains,after my nabber told me and my child's mother ,about strange lights towards mountain range.Sins then i had several experiences with strange and unusual phenomenon   .I am at a friends using his computer ,so i don't have my note pad with me were i got time and dates recorded . what can tell you is that iv e  witnessed  blue orbs floating and multiplying ,orange glowing spheres with black corers hovering over the mountains orange lights faded into the black cores then flew off. i must speak with some one from mufon.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Cloaked almost invisible looked like a bird or butterfly flickering around size 3 houses

content.detailedDescription:
It was the mexico's independence day party in my university, the "u.A.C.J." at the engineering institute, above 6pm, then, i was leaving the school to get to my home and for some reason i rise my head and i saw in the sky one sphere, very brilliant, with metalical appereance, like alluminium foil, something like that, it was satnding semi-static right above mi head at 1 km. of distance, more-less.
the object was not entierely static, it was moving very very slow, in a very exacto pattern, it was moving to the west and then return to it's original possition moving to the east. that movements take almost two hours, moreless 1 hr moving very slowly to the west, and back, but the object didn't move much i think, talking about distance from the original possition, aproximediately 5 to 15 degrees in refference of my possition.
the sun-light was hitting the object making it shine, a lot, but when the sunset pass out, the object started to climb more rapidly and passing some 20 to 30 seconds the object was comppletely invissible.
one neighboor saw the object to, and i was able to taking some pictures from the objetc, and to take a video in my camera.
i feel something very strange, like other times that i saw strange objects in sky, i feel some combination of joy, happyness, scare, emotion, fear, but all in the same time, and i can say that only in situations like that i feel in that way.
i lose sight of the object because later than the sunset the object stop shinning and a few seconds before that it started to climb, not to fast, but i lose sight.
content.summary: Semi-static argentine-white metalical sphere in sky by 2 hours

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from stephenville toward my parents house which is a dublin address.  as i was approaching their house which is on the left side of fm 242, dublin texas i saw about 30 or more huge lights with a yellow tint flashing, one after the other, in an oval to round shape.  they appeared very low to the ground, the shape appeared to tilt to one side slightly.  turning into the drive way, the house obstucrted my view of the ufo lights.  i began honking my horn as i drove into the drive way, trying to get my mom and duahgter's attention so they would come outside and see what was going on.  as i ran up the walkway to the front door i could barely see the ufo lights.  when they came outside the lights were gone, but we saw and heard 10-15 jets flying much higher in the area above their house.  funny thing though, i heard no noise coming from the ufos.  the only thing i felt was excitement, i was wearing extremely high heels and am 5 months pregnant, otherwise i would have ran toward the lights, becausse they appeared that close.  about 20 feet behind my parent's house in the pasture just behind.  i was the only car driving at this time on a dark farm to market road.
content.summary: 30-40 large yellow tint lights flashing in a round shape for a few minutes

content.detailedDescription:
i've had three sightings of unexplained crafts that defy explanation, in the past three weeks. the first was on february 23rd at about 8:07 pm. i was walking to my car, having just left my friend's house, and as i got about five feet from my vehicle i looked up. my eyes instantly went to the brightest light in the sky, which was a plane with two white lights and a blinking red and white beacon light. as i realize what i'm seeing i notice that behind the plane is what looks like a dim star moving at the same speed about three inches behind the plane. as i start to focus on the dim light, it brightens itself and then deviates from it's path trailing behind the plane, and drops at a faster rate towards the ground. as it falls about four inches from where it was, it gets dimmer, then ( as if drawing a u in the sky ) gets brighter and starts heading back up and to the right. my friend's girlfriend pulled into the driveway and as her headlights hit me, i took my attention off of this amazing light to get out of the way and when i looked back up, it was gone.
  then on march 3rd at 12:37 pm i'm driving to work. as i pull up to the light on 75th street and wherli rd. to make a left on 75th, i notice directly ahead at my 12 o'clock position, i notice what looks like a star in the middle of the day. that day there wasn't a cloud in the sky and in the middle of all the blue was a bright ball of light that had a dark spot underneath it. it was a shiny object that was reflecting the sun and the dark spot underneath the shine was the bottom of this object that wasn't being hit by the sun. as i watch this shiny craft, it moves slowly to the right and them right before my eyes, it slowly cloaks itself, losing it's shine but still has it's shape. it was the most extraordinary thing to see. this object was able to mask itself to the point where i eventually lost it after about 5 seconds once it made itself invisible. i don't know if it went out of our atmosphere and that's why it slowly lost it's color and mass, or whether it cloaked itself, but right before i lost it in the blue, i could still see it's shape but it's reflective surface was gone. just like if you took a crystal ball and hung it in the sky, where you can see through it but still can see it's three dimensionality.
  last but not least, the very next day i'm on my way home from work at 7:36 pm and just as i turn onto 75th street to go up to wherli rd., i see another bright moving star. this time i pulled over and got out of my car to verify what i'm seeing, and to try and use my phone to take video of it. this moving star slowly moved above me and after about two minutes of watching this bright light with no beacon lights, or any other lights for that matter, it got dimmer, and dimmer, and then disappeared right above me. i was absolutely astonished. three sightings in weeks of each other. i don't know why i'm seeing so many sightings so close to each other, but i'm sure of what i saw. i wanted to see if your investigators can keep an eye out here because this is amazing and someone should be watching the sky up here, cause something's visiting here and it needs to be put on video and documented. 
   thank yo for your time. by the way, what camera can i buy that will be able to capture the night sky if i want to take video of what i'm seeing?
content.summary: Moving star that suddenly loses brightness then fades to nothing

content.detailedDescription: I noticed from my porch (which faces east)an unusual bright (i first thought it was a large bright meteor) object (no strobe lights or sound) traveling from the north east toward the south west (more due south than west. the object appeared to be gaining altitude and was a very bright orangeish white light (no sound). i called for my wife to come and see the object. she stated she could see a triangle structure with the light in the center, i then said "get your camera quick" and i will keep an eye on the object. she came back with camera and we took some photos (none came out very well) but the object had moved so far south and gained altitude that you can only see a dim round bluish light. my wife said she saw what appeared to be wings that were retracted into the sphere then it performed a very quick dart left then right then up then down, then shot up and appeared to disapear. we were both excited and i was a bit disappointed that i didn't grab my camera as soon as i saw the object. if there is a next time i'll know better.
content.summary: Very bright orangish/white light appeared to be at high altitude

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on florida turnpike and noticed a strange 'fireball" with a tail falling to the earth very slowly. thought it was a plane on fire crashing. the before it hit the ground, it seperated into4-5 orbs/objects and flew into different directions and different angles but relatively horizontal.  objects looked to be moving at different speeds until we could no longer see them.  this occured in homestead florida. near homestead airforce base.
content.summary: Ufo over homestead, florida.

content.detailedDescription:
This picture was captured 21 feb 2010, 2:26:49 pm. looks like a group of ufos in side-by-side formation in front of my garden���s sky. they came forward to me then raised up with tremendous speed (observed it through the view finder). 

please add this attached picture to case 18817 file (long term visitation). more details from:  http://ufo-spacelife.Blogspot.Com/
content.summary: Picture of multiple colorful ufos side by side

content.detailedDescription: On aprox 1/31 my husband & i were walking home from a neighbor's house at about 8:00 pm.  the sky was very clear w/ some light clouds w/lots stars apparent.  the street we live on is very dark & i commented to my husband that the lights, that illuminate the steps to our house (our house is on a very small hill) were out due to a recent power outage, which would make climbing those stairs slow going.  as we started up the stairs to our home, there appeared a beam of light that came from nowhere. i quickly turned to look behind to see if someone had just shined a flashlight at us, but no one was there.  i turned back to my husband, who was 2 steps ahead of me, and noted there was no shadow that would be there if the light had come from behind me.  immediately he looked up, thru the trees but did not have a clear view of the sky, so he did not see the source either. the light lasted about 4-5 seconds then just went out. interestingly, i perceived a white light, he perceived a bluish light.  it illuminated about 15 feet of stairs & part of the driveway. the really strange part is the stairs are borders by thick, fairly high bushes & thick and very tall redwoods, which is why he could not get a clear look at the sky from the stairs. i don't know how a clean beam of light could have gotten thru the bushes and the trees, but it did without casting any type of shadow. the light was bright & offered alot more light & covered alot more area then the decorative malibu type lights that usually are on.  as soon as i made it to the top of the stairs i scanned the sky.  nothing...No planes, no noise (only alot of neighborhood dogs barking), no "something weird" in the sky. my husband wanted to get into the house immediately, as it was very unverving for him. for some reason, i had no negative feelings and wanted to stay to scan the sky, but went in but returned a few minutes later to let the dogs out in the backyard.  i noted nothing unusual in sky.
content.summary: Another "beam of light" report

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were outside at night around six o clock and we could see the stars crystal clear. when it looked kinda like a star but it was moving really fast through the sky. then later we saw the same thing but only there were two lights they were both parallel from eachother and stayed that way even when they were moving. then out in the distance there was a bright orange light that fell to the ground. it looked like a star fell from the sky. we were looking around to see where it may have landed. but we didnt go to the exact spot we just stood across the road and watched. we didnt see any fire but could tell there was some light in the distance. we saw planes like five or six planes flying towards the spot. they were going pretty fast too. then at about eight o clock i started to walk home from my friends after seeing all that the planes were still everywhere in the sky and ive never seen that many before. there was another light flying through the sky and planes following behind it. the object was doing very fast speeds and moving like nothing ive ever seen before. then it just slowly faded in the sky with the planes still following it. the object was moving very fast i could tell the plane couldnt keep up.
content.summary: White light, looked like a star, orange red light.

content.detailedDescription:
We live outside of river falls, wi which is rural farmland with woods and fields. our house sits at the top of a bluff and we can see down into the valley heading east and south towards river falls and points south and east which include hudson, wi, roberts, wi prescott, wi, hastings mn etc.

our home is a multiple level home with our master suite on the top floor. i had been on the main floor doing some furniture rearranging when i stopped for a minute to go upstairs to our bedroom/bathroom. i was in our bathroom and happened to look up and out the windows on that side of our home which faces down into the valley, east and south as i just described. i often look out those windows when in our bathroom because the view is pretty at night, a black night sky with a few house lights far into the horizon in the valley.

as i looked out the window there was suddenly a very bright light in the sky, flashing, getting brighter and spreading in all directions. it filled a good part of the night sky and seemed to hang there, like in slow motion and it left me with what i call an afterglow, like one would get when a flashbulb goes off in your eyes. i did not hear any sound with it and i can not tell how close it was though i could swear it was right outside my window and over the several acres behind my house as it sweeps from the crest we are on and down into the valley where highway 65 runs north to south. 

i did not notice a color but i was totally focused on the light and how bright it was and how big it was.  i am not sure how long it lasted because i just stood there staring at it. for whatever reason during the time that i was watching it i did not give much thought to defining it. that came after i stopped watching it. i was mostly just in awe.

when it was gone i washed my hands and went quickly back down to the main level of our home and asked my daughter if she had seen it. she looked at me like ���seen what���? i told her what i had seen and she said no i did not see it but i believe you. odd thing for her to say now that i think about it. i looked out our rear kitchen window which faces the same direction as our bathroom to see if there was anything else and i did not see anything.

i turned the tv channel from cnn to the weather channel see if there were storms in the area because sometimes we do get thunder or lightening in the winter. everything was clear winter sky for our area. i later took note that the stars were out which i had not even seen before when i was watching this light.

i went looking last night on the web to see if anyone else had seen it and then saw that there had been another quake in taiwan in the same time frame. nothing about lights in the sky. i have heard stories about how sometimes lights will appear in the sky before a quake because some kind of electromagnetic energy is being release but the quake was in taiwan so i would not think we would be seeing lights for something like that here.

i was curious again this morning because seeing the light has stayed with me and i looked again and saw nothing till it occurred to me to look on mufon and saw that someone else had seen it, or at least it sounds like they did. i checked here because i have seen odd things before and knew about mufon but never reported anything on the website.

i was beginning to think it had been a transformer blowing on the hill. now i know that is not the case because the other person who saw something was actually in town and from their description and would not have been able to see a transformer from where they were.

maybe a meteor? it had to be pretty darn close to be so bright and visible if that is what it was, and there was no sound.

my feelings were excited, yet i was moving kind of slow. there was no fear, more like wow, that is incredible! what is that? did anyone else see that? was i the only one? i remember thinking it was something different.  i think i am going to have to draw it if that is possible. i also remember thinking something about the earthquakes we have been having.

thinking about this it makes me think of a light that our family saw in the night sky on a friday night about a week ago. i know it was friday as it was end of the week and no one wanted to cook so we were on our way to get a bite to eat. we were heading north and then west towards hudson, wi on county road ss and i looked out my car window to the north and east as my husband drove and saw this strange light in the sky. 

it looked like light that had been sent through a prism and you could see vertical bars of light touching each other all one color very pale. i asked everyone else if they could see it and we slowed down and pulled somewhat to the side of the road so that we could see it better. there were four of us in the car and all of us saw it. it was pretty big and high in the sky. we discussed whether it might be from a search light but it did not start from the ground up and nothing seemed to be around in the sky to make it. it was just there in the sky. i wondered about northern lights but it seemed to have too distinct a shape for that. 

we watched it all the way into hudson on county road u and then n till we got on highway 94 and headed west. on the way back we did not see it. the drive from our home to hudson takes somewhere around minutes. i���m now wondering if anyone else saw that light too.

our feelings/comments about this light were curiosity and we talked about what it might be and how odd it was. 

i'd love to know what these lights were.
content.summary: Very bright light that filled the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving ion my car and comin onto the richmond/ san rafael bridge, andi  had just past the toll plaza, and was coming up on an incline so my sight was shifted up to the sky, when i noticed 2 very small silver things flying across the bridge in fron of my car, at first i thought they were jet planes but then i could see they were too small to be jets, and i noticed that it was silent as they flew by, so i knew they could not have been jet planes, i even waited with my radio turned down and window rolled down to see if i could hear them after they flew by, and i couldn't hear a sound. as they were passing me by i saw they were bright shiny silver with an opalessence to the metal, it was a metal i had never seen before in my life. whatever they were, they were not anything i've ever seen in my life.
content.summary: Two ufo's flew right over the richmond/san rafael bridge

content.detailedDescription:
Regarding report number 22024, occurred on 2007-08-28:

     i didn���t witness this or know anyone who did. the person that filed the report on feb. 27, last week, described the object as ���big, about a hafmile long��� and that it ���disapeard into the side of a hill.���

     that person has a reason to report this 2 ��� years later. the businesses he referenced as his workplace then and the landmarks for the object���s downward trajectory are located just to the southwest of the intersection of tn-61 and i-75. this is northeast of clinton, tn.

     using google, the drawing included with the report suggests the object came down to the northeast of the above-mentioned intersection. but the person���s description suggest the trajectory was to the northwest of his location ��� ���it came down behind the krystals sighn back twords the ford dealership���.

     he also wrote ���i was on brake with one of my friends, ther wer werkers remodeling the git n go thay wer putting the roof over the gass pumps whin i noetised thim pointing up in the sky.��� that friend and the roofers need to be interviewed. using the nearby landmarks, a vector of 1 or 2 degrees needs to be established, and the area put under long-term investigation. any lakes in the vector should be put under electronic surveillance.

http://alienvisitorevidence.Blogspot.Com  has the complete original report.


     how long we will continue to be treated like children on what the d.C. insiders call ���the core story���. give credit to president obama for his actions late last year that have and will result in a significantly more open u.S. federal government.

      project serpo (serpo.Org) posting #27a is said to be the first one of six transcribed sets of ���et��� briefings ronald reagan received after he took office in january 1981.

     fourteen years ago, patrick huyghe published ���the field guide to extraterrestrials ��� a complete overview of aliens lifeforms ��� based on actual accounts and sightings���.
content.summary: Regarding report number 22024 occurred on 2007-08-28  titled ‘big silver object falling blue sky no sound’

content.detailedDescription:
Eu estava na minha viajem de formatura no hotel eldorado, na cidade de atibaia, o hotel ficava no meio de uma reserva natural, no meio de uma mata, quando olhei para o c������u vi um objeto que parecia uma bola cruzando o c������u numa velocidade estavel, n������o estava r������pido e nem estava devagar. ele emitia uma luz, como a de um avi������o, s������ que bem mais intensa, aquilo era diferente de tudo que eu j������ vi na minha vida, ele passo em linha reta e depois sumiu no meio das arvores, ele n������o fazia barulho nenhum e parecia estar a uns 30 metro do ch������o e a esfera devia ter uns 5 metros.
logo que vi eu n������o queria acreditar que era um ufo, eu queria acreditar que era algo conhecido, como um avi������o, helicoptero, ultraleve ou algo do tipo, mais na manha seguinte vi um ultraleve e ele fazia muito barulho. aquilo era algo do qual eu nunca tinha visto.
s������ estou escrevendo para voc������s pois sei que voc������s fazem um trabalho s������rio e que quanto mais pessoas relatar melhor ser������, sempre acreditei em ufos e depois desta experiencia acreditarei mais ainda.
obrigado
content.summary: Eu vi uma bola de luz no cã©u

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were walking home from the store last night when we got 
about two blocks away from home, i don't know why but  happened to look
up,and i saw a very intense almost florecent light rapidly fallig from the 
sky, i grabbed my son josh and screamed "did you just see that!" and he 
said he didn't see anything.He asked what i saw and i told him i saw a
very intense green colored light almost florecent falling from the sky.
i knew it wasn't anything i'd seen before and while it was visible and
falling it almost seemed to slow down.
i really don't know what it was, but i told my son i've just witnessed
either a ufo or a meteor, alls i know was i was left with a definite
unsettled feeling, he gave me a funny look so i shrugged it off and we
finished the walk home.
i know i watched it till it went behind the apartment building in front of us, thats it thats all there is.
but i hope i wasn't the only one to see it!
content.summary: Saw an intense green light falling from the sky seemed to slow down

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside in the courtyard of three portable buildings at cottonwood baptist church, all covered by a separate steel-framed covering/roof. the buildings are positioned on the south, west, and north sides, with the east side being open. at approximately 7:40pm, i heard a long afterburner sound, probably 15 to 20 seconds worth. it sounded exactly like an f-16 engine, and i'm confident that it was not a twin-engined jet or a group of jets.

approximately one minute later, i was on the east side of the courtyard facing west. i was watching the activity in the courtyard when something caused me to look up over the roof of the outbuilding to the west. i saw four orange lights forming the corners of an inverted trapezoid. the lights were of medium intensity, very similar to seeing an old streetlight in the distance. these lights did not seem connected, and as my eyes adjusted, i thought i saw stars between them, though i can't be sure because of the lighting around me at ground level.

when i first noticed them, i knew immediately that these were the lights that had been seen before from this same location around thanksgiving. my wife and son along with several others had noticed the lights in the same position (west) in the sky during an outdoor fellowship meal.

the lights did not change position or intensity. since i registered them as streetlamp-like lights, my mind guessed an altitude of 500 - 1,000 feet. the interesting thing about my vantage point is that there is a very narrow distance between the top of the outbuilding's roof and the steel-framed roof, limiting the combinations of altitudes and distances that these objects might have. if my altitude guess is correct, this would place the lights directly over the town of dublin.

i had time to realize that i was seeing a light event, look for structure between the lights, and sense that there was none before they went out one by one - i believe that top left, lower right, top right, lower left was the order they went out in. they turned off in a manner consistent with a power source being removed, rather than the flickering or changing intensity associated with a burn-out event of a flammable object. the delay between one light going out and the next felt precise. if you say "one and two and three and four" that's the time pattern they followed.

because of the afterburner sound beforehand, i was completely convinced that this was a military operation from the moment i saw them. i immediately switched to looking for structure, and couldn't see any. after that, i mainly focused on the upper left light because it felt "closest", and i looked for structure around the light. no structure was detectable.

at 8:23pm, two military jets flew over, one to the west of the church, and one directly overhead. the one overhead registered as being at greater than 10,000 feet, and had just enough engine noise to make me look up and look for it. that was the last thing i saw in the sky before we left.

no one else around me at the time (7-8 adults, ~30kids) reacted, but i did find out that a couple of the girls in the kids group saw the lights as well. within an hour of the event, after relaying the story to other adults, two different men told me that military jets and helicopters had been flying extremely low around the stephenville and hamilton areas in the preceding days. of significance, there had been a very low flyover of the a&m agricultural research facility at the corner of hwy 281 and hwy 8 (lingleville road). this location is approximately 12 miles north/northwest from the location of the sighting.
content.summary: Four orange lights comprising the four corners of an inverted trapezoid. they blinked out individually.

content.detailedDescription:
It was very very cold outside, (-20f) i had let the dog out and noticed a deep reddish orange light appear over the tree line about 1/2 mile to the south west. the light came on, then went out.  i called my husband to grab the camera, but it was so cold the camera froze up as soon as we went outside.

we continued to watch from an inside window.. three lights in a row would come on, one at a time, then go out.  then all 3 came on and went out one at a time. 

several months later i mentioned this to a friend of mine who got all excited because she saw it too, from a different area, but in the same direction. 


several months later, this past summer my daughter was with this same friend of mine and they were driving back home to edgar from wausau.  she noticed something in the sky and pointed it out. no one else could see it until they got into town off the freeway.  they sat on their front porch for a while (this was after midnight) and saw the object slowly move up and down the street a few blocks away.  then, suddenly a sparkly shiny light flashed down for a brief second and the object was gone. my daughters friend was sitting facing her and saw her face light up from the glow of the light that came down from the object. i can have her send in her own report of the incident.
content.summary: 3 glowing red lights appeared over the tree line across the street

content.detailedDescription:
While driving on highway 89 north in nh i witnessed a bright light appear in the top edge of my windshield. i leaned forward and looked up and observed a bright light meandering along under apparent intelligent control. i immediately recognized the light as some kind of propulsion. the craft was very low in the sky maybe one hundred yards or more up, it was just below the mountain line in the background. the flight pattern of the craft was a very slight and gradual weaving from left to right barely noticeable. then, suddenly, it accellerated faster than any aircraft i have ever seen and i have seen the fastest aircraft in the world, the sr71, take off many times. then, the most amazing thing of all happened, the craft, while accellerating, made an absolute ninety degree turn to the right(east), which confirmed my thought of the light being that of the propulsion system, the light was no longer visible because the craft had turned, and there was no light visibly emminating from the back after it turned, then it was gone in a split second as it accellerated even faster. i was able to see just a shadow of the craft against the moonlit sky as it dissapeared, and as fast as it took off it did appear to literally dissapear. 

due to my job at the time, i was in this particular area six days per week and generally around the same time, and i had witnessed many strange things in the exact same area on many different occasions. such as, lights that would appear in the sky and just drop straight towards the ground as if they were dropped from the sky, also i watched a light race around the inside of a cloud very rapidly, the light was literally inside the cloud not on the exterior, there was no beam coming up from the ground, the light just kept racing around and around inside the the cloud. then, one day in broad day light flying directly over concord, nh was a black object that appeared to be block shaped and had a flame trail about one hundred yards long emitting from what appeared to be the back of the object. i have photos of this object. the very next day i saw two army helicopters following the same path as the object had the day before.
content.summary: Fly over

content.detailedDescription:
Was in 1974, in my father farm, at 22:00h. me and my family were watching tv, when the energy down. we were outside the house to see what was happening. then, we saw above the montain, nine kilometers of distance, a strange orange fireball, moving such as a square, i want say, drawning a square. this objetic, stayed there about 30 min and then, disappeared so fast.
in this time, the energy returned and the television was ok.I go to the farm ever month, and since this case, i never saw anything.
content.summary: Orange fireball
content.locationName: Santo Antônio de Pádua, Rio de Janeiro

content.detailedDescription:
A friend of mine reported to me that he and several friends went to witness something  that others had previously seen or experienced.  the location was in georgetown or conway, sc or somewhere in the vacinity.  i'm sure if he was interviewed by a professional, he could help narrow down the location.  his story goes as follows:

he and 3 friends went to a location where they had heard that a phenomenon has occurred for others.  according to him (his name is luke and has said he'd be willing to repeat this to a professional investigator.)

according to luke, upon going down a dirt road, and 'orb'  (my word, not his) approached them.  he said it may have been 4 feet across, but first appeared as a small blip of light.  he and his friends had 3 video recorders going in anticipation of something happening because of local lore.  he said they later "woke up" several hours later on the road to myrtle beach where they were staying with no recollection of what happened from the time they saw the ball of light until then.   also, hours of video were missing from the 3 cameras they had.  he further states that the next day he had a foreign object in his hand that his doctor later explained to be from heated aspartame in a diet cola that he ingested.

several things struck me from this story:

1.  lost time
2.  lost video
3.  an unexplained object that raced toward them.
4.  a foreign object in him the next day which he claims is still there.
5.  he says at least one other member of his party has an object in them from this.
6.  he described it as an orb, though 'orb' was my word, not his, he said it was a "ball of light"

he says locals have reported similar expriences, which is why they went down this road with video cameras rolling.

he says he'd be willing to interview with a mufon investigator.  i told him that he should, because they could ask questions in a professional manner. i should be able to set up an interview with him if someone wants to follow up on this. 

i believe his story to be true.  he did not volunteer the info about something being lodged in his hand until after i told him that it was not uncommon for something like that to happen to people who have had experiences like this.  he claims to have never heard of mufon.

i have never had an experience like this, but have seen enough documentary evidence to believe that this bears following up by someone who is trained to document this.

let me repeat:  i believe he has some unexplained encounter.

if you want to set up an interview, contact me at the email address above.

randy g.
content.summary: Orb approached them, time lost, hours of video lost on 3 cameras.
